I drive process synergies across different product groups and hub locations, within the BU, ensuring flawless projects quality operation. Whenever required, I lead improvement workshops, using suitable quality tools (Lean, six Sigma, PDCA, Kaizen, FMEA, etc.), for implementing global change management initiatives and enhance process efficiency, measuring and monitoring business performance through KPIs. The purpose of my job is to raise BU project execution performance improving quality in operation to drive profitable growth.

roles.title: HBU Continuous Improvement Leader & Quality Manager - Central, Southern & Eastern Europe
roles.description:
Assure the effective implementation, maturity assessment and continuous improvement of all processes along the entire value chain to improve customer satisfaction and increase profitability in a safe working environment across the HBU organization and the local units.
Ensure consistency of processes and quality in a geographically and culturally wide-spread operation. Drive the implementation of the integrated HBU, differentiating from both local/regional and global competitors through quality, performance and reliability of the offering, working close to customers, value chain partners and understanding of local requirements, whilst driving an optimizing cost structure within the complete value chain of the HBU.

roles.title: Quality Assurance Leader
roles.description:
I led TAP Quality function developing and implementing the Quality Strategy and Quality Program to monitor and improve business processes. I led reviews & audits to assess process compliance during project execution, for suppliers and ECP contractors. I defined the training program, functional KPIs and metrics to improve operational performance and shareholders expectation.
I developed and functionally led the Quality Control organization of over 70 people (in Italy, Albania, Greece and manufacturing sites) that was responsible for the inspections and surveillance of supply chain and site activities.
In collaboration with IT department we implement digital transformation throughout the organization, increasing by 30% process digitization.

roles.title: Senior Quality Assurance Advisor
roles.description:
I was responsible of assuring the effective implementation, maturity assessment and improvement of all processes along the entire value chain to improve shareholders and stakeholders satisfaction and increase profitability across the business. 
Maintain the Integrated Management System, managing business audit program with the aim of improving processes across the business. I built and deploy continuous improvement strategy and roadmap based upon financial impact, availability of resources and timing concerns.

roles.title: Global Head of Quality C&C, Gas Business
roles.description:
I led a global team of 15 people in charge of development and maintenance of quality function in Construction & Commissioning organization for Alstom Power Gas Business. These responsibilities include maintenance of Quality Management System (QMS), resources management within the function, implementation of business quality strategy, create specific objectives and cascading the global campaigns to Construction & Commissioning population (about 400 people). I developed implemented and measured the performance of the function through proper Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) with the aim to enhance Customer Satisfaction.
I developed and implemented “Zero Deviation to Quality Control” program throughout the global organization aiming to train all site people on major “Critical to Quality” activities and to change site quality culture.
I coordinated and drove “Process Landscape Initiative” to improve function’s Quality Management System (QMS) reducing wastes to enhance Quality Performance. I develop yearly internal audit program and monitor its implementation throughout the whole organization and sites, participating as Lead Auditor during some of the audits.
I developed and drove continuous improvement strategy within the function ensuring the flawless execution of 8D, Lean, Six Sigma (DMAIC) and FMEA projects. Competency development was implemented with constant training to office and site personnel.

roles.title: Head of Quality C&C, ELA Region
roles.description:
I was responsible for Non-Conformance Report (NCR) and Experience Response Systems (ERS) processes in Construction & Commissioning organization. I analyzed NCR records to identify any corrective actions to improve quality reporting as well as to trigger specific actions to prevent re-occurrence of quality issues. I issued Quality Alerts to all sites related to major NCRs.
I produced key performance indicators (KPIs) reports for the organization and I implemented site Construction & Commissioning Road Map audit program to ensure high level of performance during site execution. I run 5 audits as Lead Auditor and I delivered training to office and site personnel.
I led and coordinate improvement projects to optimize Construction & Commissioning cost and efficiency. I led and implemented successfully one of the Gas business TOP 10 8D project to improve welding activities at site.

roles.title: Constuction QA/QC Coordinator
roles.description:
I implemented the function Quality Management System (QMS), based on ISO standards requirements, to ensure the fulfillment of legal, contract, client requirements and Foster Wheeler Italiana (FWI) policies. I prepared QMS audits schedule and executed audits at construction sites.
I prepared, reported and analyzed Construction sites Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and coordinated internal improvement projects to optimize cost and improve efficiency during site execution.

Family Business Excellence - Consulting, Support and Training for Family Businesses

Consulting, accompanying and training family businesses and entrepreneurial families is not only our mission at Weissman, but also our well established core competence.

We understand family businesses as a holistic system in which the characteristics of business and family meet. We feel it is one of the most important tasks of all to support family businesses in their entrepreneurial and family challenges.

Strategy development and implementation to meet todays and future market trends, organizational and management development, corporate and family governance, succession and handover are our core topics, in which we have built up unique experience and expertise in more than 2,800 projects over the past 30 years. We translate this experience and expertise into a targeted consulting, support and training offering for family businesses. roles.title: Head of Maintenance and Production Engineering
roles.description:
Managing all activities involving maintenance of machines and molds (preventive, breakdown and improvement tasks).
Leading a team of 7 people on a daily basis to guarantee full productivity for Operations.

The main responsibilities are:
- Cover the industrialization process for machineries to be installed on the shopfloor, from specs requirement, through FAT and SAT and first sampling
- Coordinate both machine and mold maintenance to minimize breakdowns and downtime, improving productivity
- Actively define budget for maintenance project and activities, and respect the agreed plan
- Promote continuous improvement activities throughout the department and proactively help other departments to implement successful solutions

In charge for the project management of automation and digitalization activities regarding productions, such as machines, robots, automated cells and data collection from production devices.

The tasks involve as well:
- Active support to continuous improvement activities

- Machine requirements and standard work definition for production process

- Machine purchase negotiation, considering safety/certification requirements

roles.description:
Head Of Quality
- Quality Management System
- Production Quality
- Project Quality
- Metrology, Material Laboratory
- Continuous Improvement, Problem Solving
- Material Compliance, Product Safety

. Responsible for general and strategic Quality Management with direct reporting line to the Executive Board: defining strategic operational goals to exceed customer expectations for Production Quality, Project Quality, Customer Quality, System Quality, Metrology-Laboratory, in alignment with COT Q. Mgr. (Liebherr COmponent Technologies).
. Ensuring implementation and certification of state-of-the-art Quality Management Systems in accordance with ISO 9001, EN 9100, customer requirements and internal guidelines and policies, regulations.
. Leading culture change in the company for Quality Mindset: deployment of Continuous Improvement Projects called Quality Initiatives – workshops, events, … deployed slogan “Liebherr Machines Bulle – Passion for Swiss Quality”.
. Enacting systematic Quality Assurance process focusing on risk prevention to ensure high quality of products and processes (FMEA, AUDITS, firewalls, QOS, QRQC, 8D, 5 Why, Lessons Learned process).
. Driving effective improvement process with systematic problem solving (RT5, Shainin projects) to enhance the quality and performance of products and processes.
. Managing the overall budget and investment planning for Quality department in cooperation with the Executive Board, Finance and other internal partners.
. In charge of people management including personnel planning, performance management, talent management and defining measures for successful succession planning.

roles.title: Quality & Continuous Improvement Manager
roles.description:

• Management of the quality teams (hierarchical and functional) of the various sites: Project Quality (Geneva, Lyon, Tokyo), Customer Quality, Production, Suppliers (Geneva, Beijing).
• Ensure that products are designed and manufactured according to customer requirements and regulations (application of CSRs in the QMS LEM, declination of the APQP, FMEA, PPAP, PPM commitment, ISO 26262, IATF16949, AEC-Q., Reach directives, RoHS, CE, UL...).
• Managing customer satisfaction by effective correctives actions and leading problem-solving in the event of non-conformance (deployment 8D, 5why, FTA, systemic approach, QRQCM, lessons learned).
• Definition and monitoring of quality management tools (KPI, COQ, ...), organization followed by audits (internal, external), quality evaluation of new suppliers, ensuring the sustainability of the certifications.
• Promoting performance improvement plans, the culture of Continuous Improvement and "best practices" among employees.

roles.title: Head of Process, Methods, Tools & Continuous Improvement
roles.description:
Designed, implemented, led full management process system of Quality department & improvement projects.
Unit management (4 people - engineers & technicians). 

2 main roles within my function:
1- 'Process, Methods and Tools' role [Implementation and maintenance of processes] - 2 people (1 people and myself)
2- 'Continuous Improvement' role [Management and control of process implemented] - 3 people

Key achievements:
※ Gave back strong authority to Quality Gate Review process applicable between 2 workstations. Made decision process more reliable by defining accurate operations flow, forms structure and content, information system and binary acceptance criteria for each station. Trained and coached each function until working independent.

※ Decreased from 30% to 5% risk to not rework properly defective parts on vehicles. Analysed failures on current defect recording paper form. Wrote rework process and implemented a new form in Excel format fitting exactly to rework process. Defined exactly roles and responsibilities by function within organization. Trained and coached all stakeholders.

※ Reduced control detection failure from 30% to 1% in incoming inspection by implementing a new method of checking vehicles and parts. Designed, tested and validated standard control document in PowerPoint format providing a framework with exact flow and content of checks to be performed.

roles.title: Head of Operations Quality
roles.description:
Managed Assurance Quality Team for shopfloor and improved process, methods & tools used for work execution. Unit management (6 people - engineers & technicians).

Key achievements:
※ Suspended customer stop delivery decision result from major claim about painting defect on carbody. Anticipated customer legal requirements by creating a measurement campaign on all produced vehicles to contain risk and defective vehicles. Conducted collection of technical knowledge on subject, determined measurement method and way to test and validate it. Organized and led measurement campaign until report measurement delivery.

※ Removed production bottleneck by improving 1st pass yield from 20% to 90% on 2 critical process steps regarding vehicles physical measures operations. Practised daily measures with all operators to identify and analyse gaps between ways of working. Defined, tested and validated best common way of working and consolidated know-how in detailed and non-interpretable Word documents. More people trained and skills upgraded.

※ Increased problem solving success rate from 10% to 90% in production by implementing a binary and step-by-step guided method to conduct problem solving at workstation. Wrote operating sequence, simple and logical questions to ask the stakeholders to structure and channel thoughts and answers. Trained and coached people until self-sufficiency.

roles.title: CAPA process leader
roles.description:
Implemented ‘Corrective Action & Preventive Action’ process as site process owner. Adapted and designed methods, tools, trainings, information system.

Key achievements:
※ Set and stabilized average processing time at 48 hours for non-conform products by implementing Quality Clinics for sensor manufacturing and customer returns. Defined and set up premises, visual management, measurement tools, traffic and storage tools dedicated to non-conform products. Designed information system in Excel format, all process flowcharts, operating documents and documentary tools for processing non-compliant products.

※ Led study to define a reliable solution reducing from 3% to 0.1% failure rate to make an error or omission during parts mechanical assembly. Conducted detailed map process (SIPOC) and deep failure analysis with business experts. Standardised and made reliable the way to find an industrial solution meeting identified needs by dividing each need into elementary function. Best solution found with full confidence.

※ Secured likelihood to find a true root cause within a controlled time frame in a context of major customer claim with complex technical issue. Anticipated 8D difficult to manage due to poor problem description by customer, lack of data and consequently many hypotheses to test. Built a specific 8D meeting frame in Excel format to master meetings sequence, collect and analyse data, keep people focused on each chronological step. Facilitated 8D progress by maintaining a permanent, regular, efficient and controlled work rhythm.

roles.title: Process Improvement Manager
roles.description:
Designed & led improvement plans about recurrent critical failures for manufacturing and design area.

Key achievements:
※ Identified root cause of historical main failure of sensor manufacturing. Practiced a deep dive immersion on daily work with operators all along manufacturing process. Mapped entire process (SIPOC), analysed all potential failures (FMEA) in team with business experts and tested all hypotheses in decreasing order of credibility until reaching the right hypothesis.

※ Eliminated risk of delivering non-compliant sensors to customers by analysing and correcting devices measuring 12 critical electrical and physical features certifying product conformity. Designed and wrote standard method and documentation to perform easily an measurement system analysis. Tested this standard in real-life situations by carrying out first test campaign upon devices with direct customer impact.

※ Reduced defect rate on a cable cutting station from 2% to 0.1%. Led process mapping (SIPOC) and conducted meticulous failure analysis (FMEA) with operators, technicians and engineers owning knowledge and experience at this workstation. Defined and prioritised clear needs to remove failure cause. Tested and validated each solution with Methods Engineer support and fully documented.
